title: There is a way to stroke path with image or bitmap like it does SKPaint.PathEffect?
body:
I have a bunch of SKPicture objects loaded from SVG files. 
I want to use some of these pictures to stroke some pathes.
I see the only way how to do that is convert pictures to bitmap and then use it as stroking pattern
But, surprise, i did not see support of such operation in skia api.
May i wrong?

comments.author: mattleibow
mattleibow
comments.body: This is a very detailed guide to using blend modes: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/xamarin/xamarin-forms/user-interface/graphics/skiasharp/effects/blend-modes/

comments.author: hongkilldong
comments.body:
